title: Is the NEET Champion Chemistry good for chemical bonding? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hi For now don’t use champion for chemical bonding Just read NCERT important topics from the. Chapters it’s more than enough to solve all the questions within time. In 3 to 4 questions 2 to 3 questions are directly from NCERT. One will be tricky so take it easy u can solve them if u r concepts are clear from NCERT All the best for exam.
Very good if you prepare with basics, short cuts. Some where explanations are so lengthy like in solving questions based on M.O.T.
response.upvotes: Answer requested by Dr Ganesh Kamath MC
